response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $950,000, which we believe is highly competitive and reflective of its true worth. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring you receive a product that exceeds your expectations. We look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We hope to hear from you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
